title: Wickham Market Walks

images.title: Chris Allen / Deben Mill, Wickham Market
images.caption: Deben Mill. The grade II* listed watermill dates from the 18th century. The machinery is complete and in working order

images.caption: River Deben at Wickham Market

description: This large Suffolk based village is located in the River Deben Valley near Woodbridge. This circular walk explores the village, visiting the picturesque Wickham Mill on the River Deben. It's a lovely spot with the photogenic old watermill sitting next to the scenic river on the eastern side of the village. To continue your walking in the area head south to Woodbridge where you can enjoy river walks and a visit to the fascinating site of Sutton Hoo. Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around Wickham Market. The detailed maps below also show a range of footpaths, bridleways and cycle paths in the area.
display_address: Crown Lane, Wickham Market, East Suffolk, Suffolk, England, IP13 0SA, United Kingdom
